recipesJson.name: Caramel Latte (Flavor Book Entry Recipe)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A sweet caramel latte 
Recipe made for FlavorBook Entry (FA) Vienna Cream 
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/06/28/fa-vienna-cream/

reviews.text: solid caramel latte flavor. perfectly sweet and too bitter (just the right amount to let you know its coffee). 5/5. keep em cominâ€™
Very good recipe. The coffee isn't too overbearing but is still very there. Typically these recipes taste like popcorn to me but this one I actually like!
